name: TAC-MEK 21XX
description:
Fun Fact, I found out one of my staple sound libraries was used extensively in Among Us. As a result, I decided to sneak a famous sound bite from that game in this one as I apparently had the rights to use it. Can you find it?

Assets Used
  • Music: Project Damocles
  • Sound: Everything Bundle (Unity Asset Store), Universal Sound FX (Unity Asset Store)
  • Explosion Particles: Voxel Arsenal
